experience.title: Merchandiser
experience.description: Filling the store shelves, helping people at the entrance counter and  working as a cashier. For an 18 year old, this was a great job to get started.

experience.title: Multimedia seller and computer expert
experience.description: In November 2021, I started as a student at a local multimedia store which focuses a lot on giving a great customer experience. My added value is my knowledge about computers, programming and networking.

education.title: Human Sciences
education.description: I graduated from secondary school in 2020, at the start of the Covid-19 pandemic.

education.title: Applied Computer Sciences
education.description: In september 2020, I started as a student at HOGENT to study Computer Sciences.

hobbies: In my free time, I enjoy spending time on my own coding projects and developing my knowledge about coding and programming. When I am away from my keyboard, I like spending time with friends, family and also enjoy a nice ride on my bike.
